Articles.Content:
I cannot save or launch anything from my SPH building. I cannot leave the building and none of the buttons work. I have to close the game and reload it. Any help would be greatly appreciated.

I have TAC-LS

Module Manager

Science Funding

Station Science

Kerbal Engineer

Stage Recovery

Greenhouse MK1

I am running this on a 32 bit install.

thanks!

Edit: Here is the output log file:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/ug9gw1anjsq1g14/output_log.txt?dl=0

Edited January 21, 2015 by RocketScientistsSon

This may be it:

DirectoryNotFoundException: Directory 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program\saves\Kargal\Ships\SPH' not found.

KSP isn't finding the SPH folder for that save, you may be able to fix this by copying the SPH folder from another save to the Kargal save.
What if I dont have another save? Can I just create another one?
Yes you can just start a new save with a different name

Ok so I started a new save. Now what? What do I look for and where do i stick it?

- - - Updated - - -

I thnk I got it. I just added a folder labeled "SPH" to the same directory that had "VAB" and it seems to have it working.
